tool_description: Evaluates leads against predefined qualification criteria sets and business rules to determine criteria match status and identify gaps.

lead_data.description: Complete lead profile data as JSON string

criteria_rules.description: Array of qualification criteria rules as JSON strings

matching_logic.description: Criteria evaluation logic: all_must_match, majority_match, or weighted_match

minimum_match_percentage.description: Minimum percentage of criteria that must be met (0-100)

criteria_weights.description: Custom weights for each criteria rule (must match criteria_rules length)

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict validation for data types and formats

error_messages: Invalid lead data format: lead_data must be a valid JSON string with complete lead information.
Invalid criteria rules: All criteria_rules must be valid JSON strings with proper rule structure.
Invalid matching logic: Use one of [all_must_match, majority_match, weighted_match].
Invalid match percentage: minimum_match_percentage must be between 0 and 100.
Mismatched criteria weights: criteria_weights length must match criteria_rules length if provided.
Criteria evaluation failed: Unable to evaluate one or more criteria rules against lead data.
usage: Provide lead_data as JSON string and criteria_rules array defining qualification requirements. Set matching_logic, minimum_match_percentage, and criteria_weights to control evaluation behavior.

criteria_match_status.description: Overall criteria match result: passed, failed, or partial

matched_criteria.description: List of criteria that were successfully matched

failed_criteria.description: List of criteria that were not met

gap_analysis.description: Analysis of gaps between lead profile and qualification criteria
